data.title: A Study on the Effects of Online Learning on Student Performance
data.abstract: This paper explores how online learning platforms impact student academic performance across multiple disciplines.
data.methods used: Quantitative analysis through surveys and test score comparisons before and after implementing online learning tools.
data.results: Students using online platforms showed a 15% increase in performance compared to those using traditional methods.

data.title: Machine Learning Techniques for Disease Prediction
data.abstract: The research investigates how machine learning algorithms can be utilized to predict disease outbreaks and patient risks.
data.methods used: Implementation of logistic regression, random forest, and neural networks on medical datasets.
data.results: Neural networks provided the highest accuracy at 92%, followed by random forest at 88% and logistic regression at 81%.

data.title: Sustainable Urban Development in Southeast Asia
data.abstract: This paper examines the challenges and strategies for sustainable urban planning in rapidly growing Southeast Asian cities.
data.methods used: Case study analysis of five urban development projects, combined with policy reviews and stakeholder interviews.
data.results: Integrated green infrastructure and community participation were key factors in successful sustainability outcomes.
